attributes.action: deport criminals if  they  have  been in  uk less than 10  years
attributes.additional_details: i think  any  one person who is breaking the  law  wether it  be a  minor traffic offence to any  other criminal activitiy they should  be deported if  they  have  been in uk   les than   10 years asap   why should  we keep these  criminals   safe fed and warm in our  prison system that is allready  stretched . can we   make  it  law that any  one  visiting or planning to stay in uk .   that if you commit any crime you will  be  deported  regardles  of  life  here .
